sources.title: William Comes to Town
sources.description: Title: William Comes to Town Summary: William Brown attempts to secure more pay and shorter hours for schoolboys. Directed by: Val Guest Actors: William Graham, Garry Marsh, Jane Welsh Production Company: Diadem Films Release Date: 31 December 1948 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 William Brown attempts to secure more pay and shorter hours for schoolboys.

metadata.Plot: William Brown attempts to secure more pay and shorter hours for schoolboys.
metadata.Actors: William Graham, Garry Marsh, Jane Welsh
